China says Beijing and Moscow should strengthen coordination on Asia PacificChina and Russia should strengthen communication and coordination in Asia Pacific affairs and jointly safeguard regional security, stability and development, the Chinese foreign ministry reported on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:15:23 GMT 32QSN5CV4JMLNONMWGLV6KSAPA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-beijing-moscow-should-strengthen-coordination-asia-pacific-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Sprawling queues for subsidised rice highlight plight of Indonesia's poorIn the afternoon sun, dozens of Indonesians, mostly women, gather in a snaking queue to buy bags of subsidised rice, their arms poking through a metal gate to grab tickets assuring them a spot to make a purchase. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 01:02:23 GMT H7KXJKHPBFKRHN634WMS7V773M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sprawling-queues-subsidished-rice-highlight-plight-indonesias-poor-2024-02-28/Dewi Kurniawati, Heru Asprihanto世界亚太地区
Chinese navy's presence in South China Sea is 'worrisome', says Philippine presidentPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday said the Chinese navy's presence in the South China Sea is "worrisome" but will not deter his country from defending its maritime territory and protecting its fishermen. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:48:04 GMT 76BQ5CUAMRPXPAABAACNRWFF4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-navys-presence-south-china-sea-is-worrisome-says-philippine-president-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China urges largest nuclear states to negotiate a 'no-first-use' treatyStates with the largest nuclear arsenals should negotiate a treaty on no-first-use of nuclear weapons against each other or make a political statement in this regard, the Chinese foreign ministry's arms control department said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:14:30 GMT LXZH3JSALVL37MCL32GQLSMR6I https://www.reuters.com/world/china-urges-un-define-roadmap-exempt-non-nuclear-states-nuclear-threat-state-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Volcanic ash forces some airlines to suspend flights from Mexico CityMexico City International Airport on Tuesday said airlines have canceled 22 domestic and international flights to carry out safety checks after planes encountered ash from the Popocatepetl volcano while flying toward the capital. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:06:14 GMT XSLWYDAWGBMBVPZ6CTXEC7RQBM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/volcanic-ash-drives-some-airlines-suspend-flights-mexico-city-2024-02-28/Reuters商业环境
Thousands told to flee homes in Australia amid heat spike, bushfire threatTens of thousands of residents in Australia's southeast were told to evacuate on Wednesday due to an intense heatwave that authorities said could further spread a massive bushfire in Victoria state, which faces its worst conditions in four years. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 23:01:18 GMT JLMUBC3TORJY5DUUGGPBQVHGKI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-told-flee-homes-australia-amid-heat-spike-bushfire-threat-2024-02-27/Reuters商业环境
Aruba issues alert after oil spill reached neighboring BonaireThe Caribbean island of Aruba issued an alert on Tuesday after an oil spill that was first spotted near Tobago spread to neighboring Bonaire, threatening its mangrove forests and national parks. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:48:26 GMT JTEMLNDL3FKVPPXTJ6CTO3IQPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/aruba-issues-alert-after-oil-spill-reached-neighboring-bonaire-2024-02-27/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
At least 31 killed in Mali bus accident, transport ministry saysAt least 31 people were killed in Mali on Tuesday when a bus plunged off a bridge over a river near the western town of Kenieba, the transport ministry said. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:34:52 GMT JZ3PEM7SNNM57ERR3J6O5IMWHA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-31-killed-mali-bus-accident-transport-ministry-says-2024-02-27/Reuters世界非洲
Top Putin ally pledges Russian help in countering U.S. in Latin America - TASSRussian Security Council Secretary Nikolai Patrushev, a top ally of President Vladimir Putin, pledged on Monday to help Latin American countries counter what he described as U.S. attempts to interfere in their internal affairs. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:32:12 GMT FUN5NG22IVNOHPI4XN2CTPO5OI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/top-putin-ally-pledges- Russian-help-countering-us-latin-america-tass-2024-02-27/Reuters世界美洲
One quarter of Gaza's people one step away from famine, UN saysAt least 576,000 people in the Gaza Strip - one quarter of the population - are one step away from famine, a senior U.N. aid official told the Security Council on Tuesday, warning that widespread famine could be "almost inevitable" without action. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 20:12:08 GMT X5PVOJPXKZMORMIC62IEGLCPZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/one-quarter-gazas-people-one-step-away-famine-un-says-2024-02-27/Michelle Nichols世界中东
US senators question Biden's Yemen strategy, want congressional authorizationU.S. Democratic and Republican senators on Tuesday questioned President Joe Biden’s strategy to deal with Houthi attacks against commercial shipping and contended he should seek congressional authorization for ongoing military action against the Yemen-based group. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 20:01:32 GMT CEHKKNOKRBKLLMRD2A7IYDCBLI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/senior-us-senators-want-congress-authorize-strikes-against-houthis-2024-02-27/Reuters世界美国
